title: DERRIDA CONFESSES, SUMMARIZES in "Punctuations: the Time of a Thesis"

HDG.LOG.content: [method of plurivocity? compare to Derrida, dissemination] succeed in delineating more meaningfully a few characteristics of en and panta: delineation should remain a preliminary free-flowing sketch, not self-assured portrayal > must reflect w/in unity of Heraclitus’ saying [closed-context?]
HDG.LOG.linkedContent: [method of plurivocity? compare to Derrida, dissemination] succeed in delineating more meaningfully a few characteristics of en and panta: delineation should remain a preliminary free-flowing sketch, not self-assured portrayal > must reflect w/in unity of Heraclitus’ saying [closed-context?]

HDG.LOG.content: thinking changes the world, changes world in ever darker depths of a riddle (Rätsel) > riddle propounded (zugesagt) to us [for a long time] in word “Being” > Being remains only the provisional (vorläufige) word [Being originally called “presencing (Anwesen),” enduring-here-before in unconcealment (her-vor-währen in die Unverborgenheit)] [truth and security, Wahrheit]
HDG.LOG.linkedContent: thinking changes the world, changes world in ever darker depths of a riddle (Rätsel) > riddle propounded (zugesagt) to us [for a long time] in word “Being” > Being remains only the provisional (vorläufige) word [Being originally called “presencing (Anwesen),” enduring-here-before in unconcealment (her-vor-währen in die Unverborgenheit)] [truth and security, Wahrheit]

HDG.IM.content: spiritual fate of the West (lose strength to observe decline) [aside on technological stupidity]: when time is nothing but speed, when a boxer counts as the great man of a people [Heidegger’s racism?]
HDG.IM.linkedContent: spiritual fate of the West (lose strength to observe decline) [aside on technological stupidity]: when time is nothing but speed, when a boxer counts as the great man of a people [Heidegger’s racism?]

HDG.IM.content: fall, bad times: flight of gods, destruction of earth, reduction of human beings to a mass, preeminence of mediocre [aren’t these all Nietzschean?]
HDG.IM.linkedContent: fall, bad times: flight of gods, destruction of earth, reduction of human beings to a mass, preeminence of mediocre [aren’t these all Nietzschean?]

HDG.IM.content: what does “world” mean? [cf. Derrida in ATIA]

HDG.BC.content: “Ground-concepts” calls us to come to stand where a footing & a permanence are granted, where all decisions are made, but also where indecisiveness borrows its hiding places [relate to Derrida, undecidable]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: “Ground-concepts” calls us to come to stand where a footing & a permanence are granted, where all decisions are made, but also where indecisiveness borrows its hiding places [relate to Derrida, undecidable]

HDG.BC.content: “poetic propositions” : “poetic” is the exception, things don’t lie as much on surface as they do in familiar [would Derrida agree?] > “is” derives [schöpft?] its meaning from being represented/addressed/articulated in proposition [Being needs beings]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: “poetic propositions” : “poetic” is the exception, things don’t lie as much on surface as they do in familiar [would Derrida agree?] > “is” derives [schöpft?] its meaning from being represented/addressed/articulated in proposition [Being needs beings]

HDG.BC.content: clock stops, we become aware of “is,” an interruption intrudes on speaking [attention beyond time?] > can only experience interruption hypothetically [yes! Derrida, Nietzsche, bell tolls]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: clock stops, we become aware of “is,” an interruption intrudes on speaking [attention beyond time?] > can only experience interruption hypothetically [yes! Derrida, Nietzsche, bell tolls]

HDG.BC.content: we 1st depend on beings because released into beings, this dependence put into word, pervasive in “is,” “are”: in each “tense-word” of language we name being [“is” method] > Being said w/ every word, verbal articulation—if not named each time w/ its own name [?] > Being as pre-giving of what 1st permits naming of beings (not addition (Zugabe)/supplement (Beigabe) [cf. Derrida])
HDG.BC.linkedContent: we 1st depend on beings because released into beings, this dependence put into word, pervasive in “is,” “are”: in each “tense-word” of language we name being [“is” method] > Being said w/ every word, verbal articulation—if not named each time w/ its own name [?] > Being as pre-giving of what 1st permits naming of beings (not addition (Zugabe)/supplement (Beigabe) [cf. Derrida])

HDG.BC.content: relinquishing thought most deplorable way for thought to accomplish task [re: refusing to rely on “paradox”]: give up question of Being as pseudoquestion, or acknowledge exposed impasse (“aporia”) (must come to terms w/ it in some way) [how to treat Derrida’s aporia?] > impasse that Being brings w/ it is its mark of distinction (eigene Auszeichnung)[mark prior to Being? differance] > acc. Heidegger, to call impasse (Ausweglosigkeit) “aporia” is to close eyes at impasse [?] [Heidegger beyond Derrida?]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: relinquishing thought most deplorable way for thought to accomplish task [re: refusing to rely on “paradox”]: give up question of Being as pseudoquestion, or acknowledge exposed impasse (“aporia”) (must come to terms w/ it in some way) [how to treat Derrida’s aporia?] > impasse that Being brings w/ it is its mark of distinction (eigene Auszeichnung)[mark prior to Being? differance] > acc. Heidegger, to call impasse (Ausweglosigkeit) “aporia” is to close eyes at impasse [?] [Heidegger beyond Derrida?]

HDG.BC.content: one can capture “lived experiences” in reports > essence of man securely delimited: man is the presencing animal (animal rationale) [?] > balance btwn “calculability” of life & drunkenness of lived experience > anthropology, Americans seek determination of what man is, how he can be most efficiently/effectively used (am wirksamsten zu gebrauchen sei) , in most appropriate place, w/out loss of time or energy [Marx-like]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: one can capture “lived experiences” in reports > essence of man securely delimited: man is the presencing animal (animal rationale) [?] > balance btwn “calculability” of life & drunkenness of lived experience > anthropology, Americans seek determination of what man is, how he can be most efficiently/effectively used (am wirksamsten zu gebrauchen sei) , in most appropriate place, w/out loss of time or energy [Marx-like]

HDG.BT.content: 19 provisional [lookup] aim is Interpretation of time as possible horizon for understanding of Being
HDG.BT.linkedContent: 19 provisional [lookup] aim is Interpretation of time as possible horizon for understanding of Being

HDG.BT.content: [destruction not deconstruction] taking question of Being as our clue, we are to destroy traditional content of ancient ontology, until we arrive at primordial experiences [utterly impossible for Derrida] that achieved 1st ways of determining nature of Being (the ways that have guided us ever since [our destiny])
HDG.BT.linkedContent: [destruction not deconstruction] taking question of Being as our clue, we are to destroy traditional content of ancient ontology, until we arrive at primordial experiences [utterly impossible for Derrida] that achieved 1st ways of determining nature of Being (the ways that have guided us ever since [our destiny])

HDG.BT.content: [destruction already has focal points at which to aim [?]: Interpretation of Being, phenomenon of time in history of ontology]
HDG.BT.linkedContent: [destruction already has focal points at which to aim [?]: Interpretation of Being, phenomenon of time in history of ontology]

HDG.WM.content: no annihilation (Vernichtung) of whole of beings takes place in anxiety > nothing doesn’t attract, essentially repelling (abweisend) > nothing itself nihilates (das Nichts selbst nichtet), grants the nothing, not submitted to calculation of annihilation or negation (Verneinung) > nihilation manifests beings in heretofore concealed strangeness as what is radically other (schlechthin Andere) [totally other] re: nothing > originally nihilating nothing brings Dasein, for 1st time, before beings as such—in anxiety original openness of Being
HDG.WM.linkedContent: no annihilation (Vernichtung) of whole of beings takes place in anxiety > nothing doesn’t attract, essentially repelling (abweisend) > nothing itself nihilates (das Nichts selbst nichtet), grants the nothing, not submitted to calculation of annihilation or negation (Verneinung) > nihilation manifests beings in heretofore concealed strangeness as what is radically other (schlechthin Andere) [totally other] re: nothing > originally nihilating nothing brings Dasein, for 1st time, before beings as such—in anxiety original openness of Being

HDG.WM.content: nothing awakens for 1st time proper formulation of metaphysical question re: Being of beings > nothing not as indeterminate opposite of beings, unveils itself as belonging to Being of beings > agrees w/ Hegel’s “Pure Being and pure Nothing are therefore the same” [also quoted in HDG.BC]
HDG.WM.linkedContent: nothing awakens for 1st time proper formulation of metaphysical question re: Being of beings > nothing not as indeterminate opposite of beings, unveils itself as belonging to Being of beings > agrees w/ Hegel’s “Pure Being and pure Nothing are therefore the same” [also quoted in HDG.BC]

HDG.IWM.content: via time as preliminary name Being is unconcealed, concealed essence of time speaks in first metaphysical names for Being & in its last name: “eternal recurrence of the same” [EROS] [is Being a metaphysical name for Being?]
HDG.IWM.linkedContent: via time as preliminary name Being is unconcealed, concealed essence of time speaks in first metaphysical names for Being & in its last name: “eternal recurrence of the same” [EROS] [is Being a metaphysical name for Being?]

HDG.IWM.content: time belongs to truth of Being in a way still concealed > every holding open of truth of Being must look toward time as possible horizon of an understanding of Being [not there yet, telos] > time as provisional goal in Being and Time ——[nice, clever] proof of oblivion of Being, the reception of Being and Time ——ontotheology (first philosophy, philosophy proper) as twofold: truth of beings in their universality & in highest being
HDG.IWM.linkedContent: time belongs to truth of Being in a way still concealed > every holding open of truth of Being must look toward time as possible horizon of an understanding of Being [not there yet, telos] > time as provisional goal in Being and Time ——[nice, clever] proof of oblivion of Being, the reception of Being and Time ——ontotheology (first philosophy, philosophy proper) as twofold: truth of beings in their universality & in highest being

HDG.QB.content: Heidegger confesses: “I myself was not focused enough to articulate w/ sufficient clarity the reasons for my suggestion” [re: why he encouraged Jünger to reissue The Worker in original form] > now the time may have become more ready to say something [only may, not there yet]
HDG.QB.linkedContent: Heidegger confesses: “I myself was not focused enough to articulate w/ sufficient clarity the reasons for my suggestion” [re: why he encouraged Jünger to reissue The Worker in original form] > now the time may have become more ready to say something [only may, not there yet]

HDG.QB.content: [immense degree of waiting] perhaps moment will come [not yet] when essence of nihilism will show itself more clearly in other ways, in brighter light, until then setting out on a path that leads to a discussion of essence of Being, on this path alone can question concerning the nothing be discussed (must relinquish language of metaphysics [does that include Being?], but [still?] subject to other demands than changing an old terminology for a new one [paleonym] > endeavor to undertake transformation will presumably remain tentative for a long time [not yet there, telos], that’s not an adequate reason for failing to undertake it
HDG.QB.linkedContent: [immense degree of waiting] perhaps moment will come [not yet] when essence of nihilism will show itself more clearly in other ways, in brighter light, until then setting out on a path that leads to a discussion of essence of Being, on this path alone can question concerning the nothing be discussed (must relinquish language of metaphysics [does that include Being?], but [still?] subject to other demands than changing an old terminology for a new one [paleonym] > endeavor to undertake transformation will presumably remain tentative for a long time [not yet there, telos], that’s not an adequate reason for failing to undertake it

HDG.QB.content: presencing (“being”) always presencing directed toward human essence, presencing as a call (Geheiss) that calls upon human essence > human essence as such is a hearing, belongs to calling of this call, the approach of presencing > that which is the Same (“being”?) each time: belonging together of call & hearing—“What am I saying? It is no longer ‘being’ at all” [beyond Being] > relinquish isolating/separating word “being” just as decisively as name “human being” [can never call human being and being same] [hermeneutic circle leads beyond Being, beyond itself?]
HDG.QB.linkedContent: presencing (“being”) always presencing directed toward human essence, presencing as a call (Geheiss) that calls upon human essence > human essence as such is a hearing, belongs to calling of this call, the approach of presencing > that which is the Same (“being”?) each time: belonging together of call & hearing—“What am I saying? It is no longer ‘being’ at all” [beyond Being] > relinquish isolating/separating word “being” just as decisively as name “human being” [can never call human being and being same] [hermeneutic circle leads beyond Being, beyond itself?]

HDG.QB.content: by no means easier to say “being” than to speak of the nothing > shows how once more, inevitably, everything depends (ankommt) on correct saying (rechte Sagen), the logos whose essence logic/dialectic of metaphysics can never experience > is it due to “being” (as Same) that our saying fails? all too readily suspected as so-called “mysticism”? > [beyond Being, Derrida] would the crossing of the line leave language of fundamental words to whim of those who are speaking? enough for language to be universally comprehensible? or do other [uniquely unique] laws/measures prevail here [totally other]? (these questions are scarcely beginning to become worthy of question—to feel home in them)
HDG.QB.linkedContent: by no means easier to say “being” than to speak of the nothing > shows how once more, inevitably, everything depends (ankommt) on correct saying (rechte Sagen), the logos whose essence logic/dialectic of metaphysics can never experience > is it due to “being” (as Same) that our saying fails? all too readily suspected as so-called “mysticism”? > [beyond Being, Derrida] would the crossing of the line leave language of fundamental words to whim of those who are speaking? enough for language to be universally comprehensible? or do other [uniquely unique] laws/measures prevail here [totally other]? (these questions are scarcely beginning to become worthy of question—to feel home in them)

HDG.FS.content: adverb aei, “always already”: more eternal than everlasting (former does not dominate time [w/ presence?])
HDG.FS.linkedContent: adverb aei, “always already”: more eternal than everlasting (former does not dominate time [w/ presence?])

HDG.FS.content: matter (Sache) itself is sole authority, in seminar we work in common, text is only a means (Mittel), not an end (Ziel) [cf. Derrida] > in genuine seminar, teacher learns the most, he must listen rightly (rechte Hören) to the text > nothing ever to be believed, must be experienced [secret (Geheimnis) of seminar, be able to read Hegel’s whole book]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: matter (Sache) itself is sole authority, in seminar we work in common, text is only a means (Mittel), not an end (Ziel) [cf. Derrida] > in genuine seminar, teacher learns the most, he must listen rightly (rechte Hören) to the text > nothing ever to be believed, must be experienced [secret (Geheimnis) of seminar, be able to read Hegel’s whole book]

HDG.FS.content: what is the Same in which day passes to night? the en, the unity, other name for Being? world, light, space, time, etc.—all too general (allgemeinen)
HDG.FS.linkedContent: what is the Same in which day passes to night? the en, the unity, other name for Being? world, light, space, time, etc.—all too general (allgemeinen)

HDG.FS.content: sound not extended in space, only in time: still it comes from a place (Ort), traverses/measures space
HDG.FS.linkedContent: sound not extended in space, only in time: still it comes from a place (Ort), traverses/measures space

HDG.FS.content: all metaphysics rests on fundamental experience of being specific to thinker: for Kant, experience of being as “Nature” > experience (the key word of CPR), for Kant, in scientific sense, mathematical physics (science par excellence since modern times) > still today, biology becomes biophysics, can predict/prepare mastery of genesis of man, anthropology becomes anthropo-physics, appearance of cybernetics
HDG.FS.linkedContent: all metaphysics rests on fundamental experience of being specific to thinker: for Kant, experience of being as “Nature” > experience (the key word of CPR), for Kant, in scientific sense, mathematical physics (science par excellence since modern times) > still today, biology becomes biophysics, can predict/prepare mastery of genesis of man, anthropology becomes anthropo-physics, appearance of cybernetics

HDG.FS.content: experience of beings, for Greeks, so rich, so concrete, significant synonyms: ta phainomena, what shows itself from itself; ta alētheia, what is revealed (Offenbare) in unconcealment (Unverborgenheit), what postpones (verweigert) concealment for a time
HDG.FS.linkedContent: experience of beings, for Greeks, so rich, so concrete, significant synonyms: ta phainomena, what shows itself from itself; ta alētheia, what is revealed (Offenbare) in unconcealment (Unverborgenheit), what postpones (verweigert) concealment for a time

HDG.FS.content: Aristotle asks what’s extant (seiend) in time?—this is a reduction, a temporal predetermination is operative > for Kant, time conceived in horizon of ob-jectivity, that which holds itself steady in constant flow of changing now > Heidegger explains how short-circuiting of meditation on time covred over meaning of being > “thinking must consequently attempt to further a new—non-metaphysical—way of thinking time [overcoming metaphysics], not governed, surreptitiously, by ontological presupposition of beinghood of time, which concentrates only on what presences
HDG.FS.linkedContent: Aristotle asks what’s extant (seiend) in time?—this is a reduction, a temporal predetermination is operative > for Kant, time conceived in horizon of ob-jectivity, that which holds itself steady in constant flow of changing now > Heidegger explains how short-circuiting of meditation on time covred over meaning of being > “thinking must consequently attempt to further a new—non-metaphysical—way of thinking time [overcoming metaphysics], not governed, surreptitiously, by ontological presupposition of beinghood of time, which concentrates only on what presences

HDG.FS.content: Heidegger calls analysis of temporality of Dasein a non-metaphysical thinking of time > time no longer series of now moments, but horizon for understanding of being > analytic of Dasein provides equipment making possible sense of being in non-metaphysical signification: destruction achieves its goal (ihr Ziel gebracht) [?????]—but, various coverings of originary sense of being maintain essential relation to what they cover over, so that metaphysics can be read positively, transformations of original meaning all belonging to single destiny—Seinsgeschick
HDG.FS.linkedContent: Heidegger calls analysis of temporality of Dasein a non-metaphysical thinking of time > time no longer series of now moments, but horizon for understanding of being > analytic of Dasein provides equipment making possible sense of being in non-metaphysical signification: destruction achieves its goal (ihr Ziel gebracht) [?????]—but, various coverings of originary sense of being maintain essential relation to what they cover over, so that metaphysics can be read positively, transformations of original meaning all belonging to single destiny—Seinsgeschick

HDG.FS.content: more disturbing than space conquest, transformation of biology into biophysics: human can be produced acc. definite plan like any technological object > science can’t stop in time, can’t limit human desire for knowledge > reason for this event: modern relation to power (political), new form of nationalism must be thought through
HDG.FS.linkedContent: more disturbing than space conquest, transformation of biology into biophysics: human can be produced acc. definite plan like any technological object > science can’t stop in time, can’t limit human desire for knowledge > reason for this event: modern relation to power (political), new form of nationalism must be thought through

HDG.FS.content: essential limitation (wesentliche Beschränkung), i.e. finitude (Endlichkeit), condition of genuine (echten) existence: for truly living human, always time
HDG.FS.linkedContent: essential limitation (wesentliche Beschränkung), i.e. finitude (Endlichkeit), condition of genuine (echten) existence: for truly living human, always time

HDG.FS.content: “Time and Being” thought “letting” as “giving (Geben)” > giving speaks in Es gibt (il y a too ontic of a translation, refers to presence of beings) > too ontic to understand Es Gibt as letting come to presence, as if it means “to make present” > rather think Es gibt re: letting itself, presence no longer emphasized: “to let the presencing (Lassen das Anwesen)” [still presence there?] (presence of a being no long draws one’s attention but ground the being covers over to stand independent) > letting as gift (Gabe), gives only its gift, withdraws/holds back (verbirgt)
HDG.FS.linkedContent: “Time and Being” thought “letting” as “giving (Geben)” > giving speaks in Es gibt (il y a too ontic of a translation, refers to presence of beings) > too ontic to understand Es Gibt as letting come to presence, as if it means “to make present” > rather think Es gibt re: letting itself, presence no longer emphasized: “to let the presencing (Lassen das Anwesen)” [still presence there?] (presence of a being no long draws one’s attention but ground the being covers over to stand independent) > letting as gift (Gabe), gives only its gift, withdraws/holds back (verbirgt)

HDG.FS.content: approach Ereignis by looking at essence of positionality (Ge-stells) > positionality (ambiguous): completion (Vollendung)/consummation (Erfüllung) of metaphysics & (at same time) disclosive preparation (Vorbereitung) of Ereignis, photographic negative of Ereignis
HDG.FS.linkedContent: approach Ereignis by looking at essence of positionality (Ge-stells) > positionality (ambiguous): completion (Vollendung)/consummation (Erfüllung) of metaphysics & (at same time) disclosive preparation (Vorbereitung) of Ereignis, photographic negative of Ereignis

HDG.FS.content: ontological determination of standing reserve not permanence but orderability, persistent standing-at-one’s-disposal (zur-Verfügung-stehen)—for consumption in planning of whole > replaceability (Ersetzbarkeit) essential to way of being today, every being essentially replaceable [cf. Derrida on substitution], Ersetzbarsein > for example: fashion > time becomes current affairs (Aktualität), continual novelty of incessant change [obsession w/ new] [Heidegger wonders whether May ’68 realized all this]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: ontological determination of standing reserve not permanence but orderability, persistent standing-at-one’s-disposal (zur-Verfügung-stehen)—for consumption in planning of whole > replaceability (Ersetzbarkeit) essential to way of being today, every being essentially replaceable [cf. Derrida on substitution], Ersetzbarsein > for example: fashion > time becomes current affairs (Aktualität), continual novelty of incessant change [obsession w/ new] [Heidegger wonders whether May ’68 realized all this]

HDG.FS.content: Weltlichkeit der Welt (Umweltanalyse) > Heidegger explains how, for first time [in Being and Time], being-in-the-world (In-der-Welt-sein) discovered as primary/irreducible fact, always already given, radically “prior” to consciousness [factical life] > still, this facticity is only “concrete” way of approaching project itself [the guiding aim (das leitende Ziel)] > [facticity subordinate to the Seinsfrage]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: Weltlichkeit der Welt (Umweltanalyse) > Heidegger explains how, for first time [in Being and Time], being-in-the-world (In-der-Welt-sein) discovered as primary/irreducible fact, always already given, radically “prior” to consciousness [factical life] > still, this facticity is only “concrete” way of approaching project itself [the guiding aim (das leitende Ziel)] > [facticity subordinate to the Seinsfrage]

HDG.FS.content: “schematism,” Kantian way of discussion Being & Time [cf. Nancy’s Logodaedalus]

HDG.MA.content: [Derrida beyond Heidegger] [Heidegger describes the homelessness of those who watch Television, listen to radio, go to movies] the rootedness (Bodenständigkeit), the autochthony, of man threatened today at its core: loss of autochthony springs from spirit of age in which we were born: the atomic age (atom bomb: its most conspicuous symbol)
HDG.MA.linkedContent: [Derrida beyond Heidegger] [Heidegger describes the homelessness of those who watch Television, listen to radio, go to movies] the rootedness (Bodenständigkeit), the autochthony, of man threatened today at its core: loss of autochthony springs from spirit of age in which we were born: the atomic age (atom bomb: its most conspicuous symbol)

HDG.MA.content: meaning pervading technology hides itself > heed that this hidden meaning touches us everywhere (in world of technology), then we stand at once in realm that hides from us, hides in approaching us > essential trait of mystery (Geheimnis): shows itself & at same time withdraws
HDG.MA.linkedContent: meaning pervading technology hides itself > heed that this hidden meaning touches us everywhere (in world of technology), then we stand at once in realm that hides from us, hides in approaching us > essential trait of mystery (Geheimnis): shows itself & at same time withdraws

HDG.CCP.content: night slows us down, leaves us time to meditate > still far from human habitation [Aristotle] > “ever more openly I am coming to trust in the inconspicuous guide who takes us by the hand” > unaccustomed task, difficult
HDG.CCP.linkedContent: night slows us down, leaves us time to meditate > still far from human habitation [Aristotle] > “ever more openly I am coming to trust in the inconspicuous guide who takes us by the hand” > unaccustomed task, difficult

HDG.CCP.content: the region gathers, each to each, while resting in itself: “regioning is a gathering and re-sheltering (versammelnde Zurückbergen) for an expanded resting (Beruhen) in an abiding (Weile)” [Gegnet], in Gegnet, openness is halted and held [Derrida beyond Heidegger]
HDG.CCP.linkedContent: the region gathers, each to each, while resting in itself: “regioning is a gathering and re-sheltering (versammelnde Zurückbergen) for an expanded resting (Beruhen) in an abiding (Weile)” [Gegnet], in Gegnet, openness is halted and held [Derrida beyond Heidegger]

HDG.CCP.content: one often doesn’t know whose tale he retells [baby daddy] > releasement as experience of waiting: release oneself into openness of Gegnet, waiting a relation to Gegnet, perhaps the relation > “relation to something would be the true relation if it were held in its own nature by that which it relates” [hetero-tautology, Derrida beyond Heidegger]
HDG.CCP.linkedContent: one often doesn’t know whose tale he retells [baby daddy] > releasement as experience of waiting: release oneself into openness of Gegnet, waiting a relation to Gegnet, perhaps the relation > “relation to something would be the true relation if it were held in its own nature by that which it relates” [hetero-tautology, Derrida beyond Heidegger]

HDG.CCP.content: night neighbors the stars, binds together w/out seam, edge or thread [Derrida beyond Heidegger] > neighbors because she works only w/ nearness > wondering upon depths of the height > wonder can open what is locked > by way of waiting > if this is released > and human nature remains appropriated to that > from whence we’re called
HDG.CCP.linkedContent: night neighbors the stars, binds together w/out seam, edge or thread [Derrida beyond Heidegger] > neighbors because she works only w/ nearness > wondering upon depths of the height > wonder can open what is locked > by way of waiting > if this is released > and human nature remains appropriated to that > from whence we’re called

HDG.DL.content: [re: “Expression and Meaning (Ausdruck und Bedeutung [double takes on Erscheinung]”] I was concerned to make visible (sichtbar machen) das ganz Andere [the totally other], which [at that time], I had only an obscure (dunkel) or confused intimation (verworren Geahnte) [Derrida beyond Heidegger: can’t make totally other visible]
HDG.DL.linkedContent: [re: “Expression and Meaning (Ausdruck und Bedeutung [double takes on Erscheinung]”] I was concerned to make visible (sichtbar machen) das ganz Andere [the totally other], which [at that time], I had only an obscure (dunkel) or confused intimation (verworren Geahnte) [Derrida beyond Heidegger: can’t make totally other visible]

HDG.DL.content: Die Achtsamkeit auf die Spuren, die das Denken in seinen Quellbereich weisen [give heed to trails (traces) that direct thinking back to region of its source] [for Derrida the traces are the source in such a way that there is no source to think back to] > do you find these traces? > I find them because they’re not of my making (stammen), because they’re rarely discernible, like the wind-borne echo of a distant call (fernen Zurufes) [annihilation of trace]
HDG.DL.linkedContent: Die Achtsamkeit auf die Spuren, die das Denken in seinen Quellbereich weisen [give heed to trails (traces) that direct thinking back to region of its source] [for Derrida the traces are the source in such a way that there is no source to think back to] > do you find these traces? > I find them because they’re not of my making (stammen), because they’re rarely discernible, like the wind-borne echo of a distant call (fernen Zurufes) [annihilation of trace]

HDG.LP.content: site (Ort), [originally means] die Spitze des Speers (point of the spear) [Derrida repeatedly refers to this statement], gathers into itself, to the highest and most extreme (Äusserste), a gathering that penetrates (durchdringt)/pervades (durchwest) everything > a site gathers & preserves (verwahrt) what it gathers, not like an encapsulated shell (Kapsel), but by shining through, lighting up, and thus releasing (entlässt) what it gathers to its own nature
HDG.LP.linkedContent: site (Ort), [originally means] die Spitze des Speers (point of the spear) [Derrida repeatedly refers to this statement], gathers into itself, to the highest and most extreme (Äusserste), a gathering that penetrates (durchdringt)/pervades (durchwest) everything > a site gathers & preserves (verwahrt) what it gathers, not like an encapsulated shell (Kapsel), but by shining through, lighting up, and thus releasing (entlässt) what it gathers to its own nature

HDG.LP.content: Geschlecht (kin, kind, generation): a human cast away (verschlagene) from Menschenwesen, stamped (geprägte) in one cast (einem Schlag) > Geschlecht: both mankind as a whole and kinship of race, tribe, family, all of these stamped in the duality of the sexes (Zwiefache der Geschlechter), decomposed form of man, man unsettled (entsetzte) > a curse (Fluch) has struck man [cf. Derrida on Geschlecht, 2nd blow of sexes] > not duality (Zwiefache) but discord (Zwietracht) is the curse
HDG.LP.linkedContent: Geschlecht (kin, kind, generation): a human cast away (verschlagene) from Menschenwesen, stamped (geprägte) in one cast (einem Schlag) > Geschlecht: both mankind as a whole and kinship of race, tribe, family, all of these stamped in the duality of the sexes (Zwiefache der Geschlechter), decomposed form of man, man unsettled (entsetzte) > a curse (Fluch) has struck man [cf. Derrida on Geschlecht, 2nd blow of sexes] > not duality (Zwiefache) but discord (Zwietracht) is the curse

HDG.LP.content: true time (wahre Zeit), the arrival (Ankunft) of what has been (Gewesenen) > not the past, but gathering of Wesenden, which precedes all arrival: gathers itself into shelter of the earlier [before the given moment?] [no presence/arrival in true time?]
HDG.LP.linkedContent: true time (wahre Zeit), the arrival (Ankunft) of what has been (Gewesenen) > not the past, but gathering of Wesenden, which precedes all arrival: gathers itself into shelter of the earlier [before the given moment?] [no presence/arrival in true time?]

HDG.LP.content: via Trakl, apartness is spiritual/ghostly (geistlich), vom Geist bestimmt, but not “of the spirit (geistig)” (in metaphysical sense) > for Trakl, in “Grodek,” spirit is flaming, not pneuma (ethereal), but a flame that inflames, startles (aufjagt), horrifies (entsetzt), shatters us, the glowing lumination > flame is the ek-stasis (Ausser-sich), which lightens and calls forth radiance, but may go on consuming (weiterfressen) and reduce (verzehren) all to white ashes [cf. Derrida on absolute ash] > “Flame is the palest pallor’s brother” > Geist, for Trakl, as gheis (ghost), a being terrified (aufgebracht), beside himself (entsetzt), ek-static
HDG.LP.linkedContent: via Trakl, apartness is spiritual/ghostly (geistlich), vom Geist bestimmt, but not “of the spirit (geistig)” (in metaphysical sense) > for Trakl, in “Grodek,” spirit is flaming, not pneuma (ethereal), but a flame that inflames, startles (aufjagt), horrifies (entsetzt), shatters us, the glowing lumination > flame is the ek-stasis (Ausser-sich), which lightens and calls forth radiance, but may go on consuming (weiterfressen) and reduce (verzehren) all to white ashes [cf. Derrida on absolute ash] > “Flame is the palest pallor’s brother” > Geist, for Trakl, as gheis (ghost), a being terrified (aufgebracht), beside himself (entsetzt), ek-static

HDG.LP.content: Geist (ghost or spirit), via Trakl, possibility of both gentleness and destructiveness (Zerstörerischen) > Das Sanfte [gentleness] schlägt jenes Außer-sich des Entflammenden keineswegs nieder, sondern hält es in der Ruhe des Freundlichen versammelt [holds ek-stasis in peace of friendship] > Das Zerstörerische [destructiveness] kommt aus dem Zügellosen, das sich im eigenen Aufruhr verzehrt und so das Bösartige betreibt [consumes itself, unbridled evil] > evil is ghostly, the revolt (Aufruhr) of a terror blazing away in blindness, the ungathered, fragmented, unholy—threatens to turn gentleness to ash (des Sanften zu versengen droht) [cf. Derrida on absolute ash]
HDG.LP.linkedContent: Geist (ghost or spirit), via Trakl, possibility of both gentleness and destructiveness (Zerstörerischen) > Das Sanfte [gentleness] schlägt jenes Außer-sich des Entflammenden keineswegs nieder, sondern hält es in der Ruhe des Freundlichen versammelt [holds ek-stasis in peace of friendship] > Das Zerstörerische [destructiveness] kommt aus dem Zügellosen, das sich im eigenen Aufruhr verzehrt und so das Bösartige betreibt [consumes itself, unbridled evil] > evil is ghostly, the revolt (Aufruhr) of a terror blazing away in blindness, the ungathered, fragmented, unholy—threatens to turn gentleness to ash (des Sanften zu versengen droht) [cf. Derrida on absolute ash]

HDG.LP.content: ghostly years of earliness: true time of stranger & friend > f
HDG.LP.linkedContent: ghostly years of earliness: true time of stranger & friend > f

HDG.WL.content: is Saying the stream of stillness that forms (bildet)/joins (verbindet) its own two banks (Ufer): the Saying and our saying after it (unser Nachsagen)? [in forming joins: contra Derrida]
HDG.WL.linkedContent: is Saying the stream of stillness that forms (bildet)/joins (verbindet) its own two banks (Ufer): the Saying and our saying after it (unser Nachsagen)? [in forming joins: contra Derrida]

HDG.EC.content: too deplorable [?] to waste a complaint (Klage) on blinded leading-astray of our own people, the devastation of our native soul > the men had decided to remain silent about this devastation (Verwüstung), which existed for a long time, & can’t be reduced to a visible enumeration—not the result of instances of human death
HDG.EC.linkedContent: too deplorable [?] to waste a complaint (Klage) on blinded leading-astray of our own people, the devastation of our native soul > the men had decided to remain silent about this devastation (Verwüstung), which existed for a long time, & can’t be reduced to a visible enumeration—not the result of instances of human death

HDG.EC.content: we’d like to surmise (vermuten): waiting reaches a still-concealed dimension of time
HDG.EC.linkedContent: we’d like to surmise (vermuten): waiting reaches a still-concealed dimension of time

HDG.EC.content: we are used/needed ( as the string sounding the primordial play of the world, the most ancient provenance (Herkunft) > this instrument is aptly (shicklich) taken up/preserved (aufgehoben) im Veroborgenen > is not answer (Antwort), even in word (Wort), the selfsame as Gegenwart ——Gegenwart is related to time, Antwort related to word, so that time & word are more intimately kindred (verschwistert) than we have presaged (ahnen)
HDG.EC.linkedContent: we are used/needed ( as the string sounding the primordial play of the world, the most ancient provenance (Herkunft) > this instrument is aptly (shicklich) taken up/preserved (aufgehoben) im Veroborgenen > is not answer (Antwort), even in word (Wort), the selfsame as Gegenwart ——Gegenwart is related to time, Antwort related to word, so that time & word are more intimately kindred (verschwistert) than we have presaged (ahnen)

HDG.EC.content: the coming: that before (voraus) which nothing can be thought, the unprethinkable (das Unvordenkliche) [cf. Derrida to-come] > what heals can’t be set forth in propositional statements (in aussagenden Sätzen darstellen), but only conversationally surmised (gesprächsweise vermuten) [Derrida would say it can only be marked on the margins, nor would he call it what heals]
HDG.EC.linkedContent: the coming: that before (voraus) which nothing can be thought, the unprethinkable (das Unvordenkliche) [cf. Derrida to-come] > what heals can’t be set forth in propositional statements (in aussagenden Sätzen darstellen), but only conversationally surmised (gesprächsweise vermuten) [Derrida would say it can only be marked on the margins, nor would he call it what heals]

HDG.EC.content: what’s essential dwells most restfully in unspoken: those who wait have longest historical time (Geschichtszeit) before us
HDG.EC.linkedContent: what’s essential dwells most restfully in unspoken: those who wait have longest historical time (Geschichtszeit) before us

HDG.OHF.content: everything modern steals away from its own time (industry, propaganda, creating “effect” only in fashion) > Dasein encounters itself, its Seinscharakter, not a matter for universal humanity or a public, but, in each case (je), definite/decisive possibility of concrete facticity
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: everything modern steals away from its own time (industry, propaganda, creating “effect” only in fashion) > Dasein encounters itself, its Seinscharakter, not a matter for universal humanity or a public, but, in each case (je), definite/decisive possibility of concrete facticity

HDG.OHF.content: for faith, man is “fallen,” his being-fallen not derived from God, but state into which man brought himself [explanation of Kant-like co-givenness of man’s goodness & his possibility of falling] > primordial experience of being-sinful (Sündigseins) at particular time: closed context of experience, basis of anthropology of Christian theology > [Nietzsche-like] God-relation (as constitutive) neutralized into consciousness of norms/values, center of acts (archē), “Ego-pole”
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: for faith, man is “fallen,” his being-fallen not derived from God, but state into which man brought himself [explanation of Kant-like co-givenness of man’s goodness & his possibility of falling] > primordial experience of being-sinful (Sündigseins) at particular time: closed context of experience, basis of anthropology of Christian theology > [Nietzsche-like] God-relation (as constitutive) neutralized into consciousness of norms/values, center of acts (archē), “Ego-pole”

HDG.OHF.content: [cf. OPEN in Derrida] historical consciousness is “there,” brings itself into open publicity (Öffentlichkeit) w/ a definite self-interpretation (bestimmten Selbstauslegung)
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: [cf. OPEN in Derrida] historical consciousness is “there,” brings itself into open publicity (Öffentlichkeit) w/ a definite self-interpretation (bestimmten Selbstauslegung)

HDG.OHF.content: free of standpoints only when there’s nothing to be done—but what if we have to look at things/research them? > free-standing detached standpoint = ruin of being-a-subject [is that now affirmative?] > developing our standpoint prior on the level of being > even unbiased seeing is a seeing, has a position in distinctive manner (appropriated so that it’s critically purged [kritischgereinigten]) > [so that an affirmative “freedom of standpoints” would be] an explicit (ausdrückliche) appropriation of our position of looking (Aneignung des Blickstandes), a position that is historical, not a chimerical in-itself outside of time
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: free of standpoints only when there’s nothing to be done—but what if we have to look at things/research them? > free-standing detached standpoint = ruin of being-a-subject [is that now affirmative?] > developing our standpoint prior on the level of being > even unbiased seeing is a seeing, has a position in distinctive manner (appropriated so that it’s critically purged [kritischgereinigten]) > [so that an affirmative “freedom of standpoints” would be] an explicit (ausdrückliche) appropriation of our position of looking (Aneignung des Blickstandes), a position that is historical, not a chimerical in-itself outside of time

HDG.OHF.content: to understand phenomenal context of significance: must see that its disclosedness stands in respective kind of care that tarries for awhile at a particular time (die Erschlossenheit in der jeweiligen Sorge steht): der Verweisungszusammenhang selbst ist das Besorgte > context of references is the environs in the authentic sense (eigentlich Umhafte), caring as a going around (Umgehen), going-here-and-there [cf. TEXT in Derrida] > significance (ontologically defined): the with-which of dealings (Umgang) with which our being cares
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: to understand phenomenal context of significance: must see that its disclosedness stands in respective kind of care that tarries for awhile at a particular time (die Erschlossenheit in der jeweiligen Sorge steht): der Verweisungszusammenhang selbst ist das Besorgte > context of references is the environs in the authentic sense (eigentlich Umhafte), caring as a going around (Umgehen), going-here-and-there [cf. TEXT in Derrida] > significance (ontologically defined): the with-which of dealings (Umgang) with which our being cares
